title: Forma proudly presents 'Schizzo'.
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416060801im_/http:/typophile.com/files/schizzo1_5480.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416060801im_/http:/typophile.com/files/schizzo2_5806.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416060801im_/http:/typophile.com/files/schizzo3_3736.jpg)
  
-

I am happy, and proud, to finally present to the dear readers of this very blog the release and prototype of the first product within the ‘Schizzo’ range. Brandnew. A note/sketch/scribble/blackbook. 210 x 230 mm. 40 pages. Munken Pure, 90 g core / 240 g cover. Available now in a limited edition test print run of 100 pcs. Get your own copy now for only 2,50 Euro _(+ Shipping). (Or purchase in bulk, 5 for only 10 Euro. + Shipping. To order, or if you have any further questions, please mail to ’schizzo@for.ma’.)_

_\> [for.ma/blog/?p=218](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416060801/http:/for.ma/blog/?p=218)_
author: Dav
